comment: The candidate demonstrates strong technical leadership with 7+ years in backend engineering, cloud infrastructure (K8S, Docker, AWS/GCP), and high-impact projects (e.g., $2M+ presale). However, lacks direct experience in OCR tools (Tesseract/OpenCV) and image processing required for this role. Deep proficiency in Python frameworks (Django/Flask) and system scalability aligns with backend demands, but gaps in document parsing and OCR-specific skills may require additional training. Well-suited for senior backend roles but less ideal for OCR-focused positions.
